thread.title: Heidi Montag Gives Lauren Conrad Marriage Advice
thread.title_full: Heidi Montag Gives Lauren Conrad Marriage Advice | The Daily Caller

author: dailycaller
title: Heidi Montag Gives Lauren Conrad Marriage Advice
text:
This was Montag before her ten procedures.
(Photo: Getty Images)
And here is how she looked after.
(Photo: Getty Images)
Though, Montag’s advice does seem like it’s in good will.
“I would just say, ‘Love is really selfless. It’s really important to be selfless and not always have to be right. You should really think about the other person. It’s about prioritizing the other person. I think love is just the key and prioritizing that in your life. Spencer and I have sacrificed a lot to be together, so I think we definitely prioritize each other. That’s the secret!”
Tags: Heidi Montag , Lauren Conrad
